turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a grande mocha frapachino please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, this is pizza hut, how may I take your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking at the $5 lineup deal, is that still available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it is. You can only order 1 topping along with one vegetable topping for the pizza at that price.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good, could I have a hand-tossed pepperoni with red onions and cheese please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, would you like any other toppings for extra charge?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'll have extra cheese with it, how much is that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be $1.50 extra.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay great, this deal comes with 8-piece breaded bone out wings correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it is a part of the $5 lineup deal.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, what flavors do you guys have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Honey BBQ, Buffalo Mild, medium, burning hot, garlic parmesan, and hawaiian teriyaki

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take the honey bbq flavor.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, would you like anything else to add to the order such as drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, what drinks do you guys have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We offer pepsi, diet pepsi, mountain dew, and sierra mist.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take pepsi, what sizes do you guys have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We offer four 20 oz beverages, do you want pepsi for all four?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would complete my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, your total is $5.35. Your order will be ready in 20 minutes.
